a lack of the ability to read and write: In the rural areas, illiteracy is widespread. Teachers and other professionals are taking part in a campaign to eradicate illiteracy.
a lack of knowledge about a particular subject: My scientific illiteracy was about to be exposed. Geographic illiteracy is a problem that only can be tackled by making the subject more interesting to students. See
illiterate
